1.text: My son, if you will receive my words, and store up my commandments within you;

2.text: So as to turn your ear to wisdom, and apply your heart to understanding;

3.text: Yes, if you call out for discernment, and lift up your voice for understanding;

4.text: If you seek her as silver, and search for her as for hidden treasures:

5.text: then you will understand the fear of Yahweh, and find the knowledge of God.

6.text: For Yahweh gives wisdom. Out of his mouth comes knowledge and understanding.

7.text: He lays up sound wisdom for the upright. He is a shield to those who walk in integrity;

8.text: that he may guard the paths of justice, and preserve the way of his saints.

9.text: Then you will understand righteousness and justice, equity and every good path.

10.text: For wisdom will enter into your heart. Knowledge will be pleasant to your soul.

11.text: Discretion will watch over you. Understanding will keep you,

12.text: to deliver you from the way of evil, from the men who speak perverse things;

13.text: who forsake the paths of uprightness, to walk in the ways of darkness;

14.text: who rejoice to do evil, and delight in the perverseness of evil;

15.text: who are crooked in their ways, and wayward in their paths:

16.text: To deliver you from the strange woman, even from the foreigner who flatters with her words;

17.text: who forsakes the friend of her youth, and forgets the covenant of her God:

18.text: for her house leads down to death, her paths to the dead.

19.text: None who go to her return again, neither do they attain to the paths of life:

20.text: that you may walk in the way of good men, and keep the paths of the righteous.

21.text: For the upright will dwell in the land. The perfect will remain in it.

22.text: But the wicked will be cut off from the land. The treacherous will be rooted out of it.
